Actions.Name: Summon the Swarm
Effects: Deals bonus damage for each character in the area. If 3 or more characters are in the area, attack becomes a critical hit on hit and all foes in the area are shattered.

Actions.Name: Skittering Mass
Actions.Description: A foe in range 8 becomes vulnerable or takes 1 piercing damage, three times as an area effect

Actions.Name: Updraft
Actions.Description: An ally or allied summon in range 6 may fly 3.

Actions.Name: Attack Insect
Actions.Description: The Apiarist summons an attack insect in range 6. It can only have one insect active at once.
